Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Garfield.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
